attributes.action: Revoke advertising gambling on tv and radio which has been allowed in 01/09/2007 Gambling Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe allowing advertising of gambling including that by bookies, casinos and betting websites on television and radio is dangerous to society. This is especially true for the vulnerable, and it sends an unhealthy message to children who could grow up thinking gambling is a fashionable thing to do, and the potential dangers become masked by familiarity of advertising hype.
